title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-13.2 - Transferring information between the Office and other agencies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 §§ 398-13.2 - Transferring information between the Office and other agencies

State Regulations

State departments or State or local agencies, including
OCFS, DOH, OMH, OASAS, and OPWDD shall furnish such information as the Office
may require for its administration of the SSP and SSPNA programs. State
departments or State agencies may request such information of the Office as
such department or agency may require for the proper discharge of its duties. Such departments and agencies shall safeguard the confidentiality of such
information, records and reports in the manner that they are prescribed to
under their governing regulations. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
§§
398-13.2

Adopted by

New

York State Register September 24, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 38, eff. 10/1/2014. Amended

New

York State Register January 13, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 02, eff. 1/13/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
